abstract: Lachlan Murdoch, a son of the media tycoon Rupert Murdoch, and the gambling magnate James D. Packer have made an offer of 3.3 billion Australian dollars ($2.9 billion) to buy the Packer-backed publishing company Consolidated Media Holdings.
lead_paragraph: Lachlan Murdoch, a son of the media tycoon Rupert Murdoch, and the gambling magnate James D. Packer have made an offer of 3.3 billion Australian dollars ($2.9 billion) to buy the Packer-backed publishing company Consolidated Media Holdings.
